alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 23 at 11:03AM MST until February 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft and Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains
